Medium: Portfolio of eleven lithographs and one screenprint
Artist: Various Artists, Alexander Calder, Marc Chagall, Maria Helena Vieira da Silva, Adolph Gottlieb, Wifredo Lam, Jacques Lipchitz, André Masson, Joan Miró, Robert Motherwell, Fritz Wotruba, Édouard Pignon
CreditLine: Gift of Jerry I. Speyer and Katherine Farley
Title: Flight
ArtistBio: (American, 1898–1976) (French, born Belarus. 1887–1985) (French, born Portugal. 1908–1992) (American, 1903–1974) (Cuban, 1902–1982) (American, born Lithuania. 1891–1973) (French, 1896–1987) (Spanish, 1893–1983) (American, 1915–1991) (Austrian, 1907–1975) (French, 1905–1993)
